sn22.38:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.38:2.2: ‘katamesaṁ, āvuso ānanda, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha?
sn22.38:2.3: Katamesaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyissati?
sn22.38:2.4: Katamesaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyatī’ti?
sn22.38:2.5: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, ānanda, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn22.38:2.7: ‘katamesaṁ, āvuso ānanda, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha?
sn22.38:2.8: Katamesaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyissati?
sn22.38:2.9: Katamesaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyatī’ti?
sn22.38:2.11: ‘yaṁ kho, āvuso, rūpaṁ atītaṁ niruddhaṁ vipariṇataṁ;
sn22.38:2.12: tassa uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:2.14: tassā uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitāya aññathattaṁ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:2.17: tesaṁ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:2.19: tassa uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:2.20: Imesaṁ kho, āvuso, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:3.1: Yaṁ kho, āvuso, rūpaṁ ajātaṁ apātubhūtaṁ;
sn22.38:3.2: tassa uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:3.4: tassā uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitāya aññathattaṁ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:3.7: tesaṁ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:3.9: tassa uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:3.10: Imesaṁ kho, āvuso, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:4.1: Yaṁ kho, āvuso, rūpaṁ jātaṁ pātubhūtaṁ;
sn22.38:4.2: tassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
sn22.38:4.6: tesaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
sn22.38:4.7: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ jātaṁ pātubhūtaṁ tassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
sn22.38:4.8: Imesaṁ kho, āvuso, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyatī’ti.
sn22.38:5.2: Yaṁ kho, ānanda, rūpaṁ atītaṁ niruddhaṁ vipariṇataṁ;
sn22.38:5.3: tassa uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:5.8: tassa uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:5.9: Imesaṁ kho, ānanda, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyittha, vayo paññāyittha, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyittha.
sn22.38:6.1: Yaṁ kho, ānanda, rūpaṁ ajātaṁ apātubhūtaṁ;
sn22.38:6.2: tassa uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:6.7: tassa uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:6.8: Imesaṁ kho, ānanda, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyissati, vayo paññāyissati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyissati.
sn22.38:7.1: Yaṁ kho, ānanda, rūpaṁ jātaṁ pātubhūtaṁ;
sn22.38:7.2: tassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
sn22.38:7.7: tassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
sn22.38:7.8: Imesaṁ kho, ānanda, dhammānaṁ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyatīti.
sn22.38:7.9: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, ānanda, evaṁ byākareyyāsī”ti.
